title: Gorgeous 2X2 Apartment Month to Month Lease Come Home !
map_address: 2201 Mahogany Way near Auto Center Drive
posting_body: ['Oakwood Village Apartments, located in Antioch, welcomes you to apply to lease our apartment featuring a spacious floor plan.', 'Our gated community has easy access to Highway 4, Somersville Towne Center, and Century Plaza.', 'Oakwood Village Apartments are located 3.3 miles from Pittsburg Bart.', 'This unit is available for immediate move in.', 'Application fee $40 (per adult in household),', 'Holding Deposit $200.00, Credit History Review, Criminal Report Review, Residential Rental History Review, Income Review(must be at least 2.5 times rent amount).', 'We offer a Month-to-Month lease and the Security Deposit ranges from $1,000 to $1,400.', 'For more details contact our leasing office.', 'We would love to hear from you soon!', 'Community Amenities', '• Stylish pool with large sun deck.', '• Covered Assigned Parking Space', '• Attentive maintenance and office staff', '• convenient shopping, entertainment and freeway options, easy access to public transit located nearby', '• 5 laundry centers', 'Residence Features', '• Large closet space', '• Spacious kitchen with updated electric appliances', '• Large private patio or balcony', '• Central air and heating', '• Pet friendly (additional deposit and fees apply)', 'Oakwood Village Apartments', 'Office Hours: Monday-Friday 8:30 am to 5:30 pm Saturday 8:30 am to 5:00 pm', 'For More Details Call-', 'show contact info', '<URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'We are a market rate property.', 'Prices and availability are subject to change without notice.']
